tika-abh09t5:301: Na cakkhu na cakkhudhātu, na dhātū na sotadhātu.
tika-abh09t5:302: Na cakkhu na cakkhudhātu, na dhātū na ghānadhātu…pe….
tika-abh09t5:303: Na cakkhu na cakkhudhātu, na dhātū na dhammadhātu…pe….
tika-abh09t5:304: Na dhammo na dhammadhātu, na dhātū na cakkhudhātu…pe….
tika-abh09t5:305: Na dhammo na dhammadhātu, na dhātū na manoviññāṇadhātu. (Cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ.)
tika-abh09t5:313: Na cakkhu na dhātu, na dhātū na cakkhu…pe….
tika-abh09t5:314: Na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na dhātu, na dhātū na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe….
tika-abh09t5:315: Na manoviññāṇaṃ na dhātu, na dhātū na manoviññāṇaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:316: Na dhammo na dhātu, na dhātū na dhammo.
tika-abh09t5:324: Na cakkhu na dhātu, na dhātū na sotaṃ…pe….
tika-abh09t5:325: Na cakkhu na dhātu, na dhātū na dhammo…pe….
tika-abh09t5:326: Na dhammo na dhātu, na dhātū na cakkhu…pe….
tika-abh09t5:327: Na dhammo na dhātu, na dhātū na manoviññāṇaṃ. (Cakkaṃ bandhitabbaṃ. )
tika-abh09t5:331: Cattāri saccāni (yama. 1.saccayamaka.1 ādayo) – dukkhasaccaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ maggasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:339: Na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccaṃ, na dukkhasaccaṃ na dukkhaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:340: Na samudayo na samudayasaccaṃ, na samudayasaccaṃ na samudayo.
tika-abh09t5:341: Na nirodho na nirodhasaccaṃ, na nirodhasaccaṃ na nirodho.
tika-abh09t5:342: Na maggo na maggasaccaṃ, na maggasaccaṃ na maggo.
tika-abh09t5:358: Na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccaṃ, na saccā na samudayasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:359: Na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccaṃ, na saccā na nirodhasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:360: Na dukkhaṃ na dukkhasaccaṃ, na saccā na maggasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:361: Na samudayo na samudayasaccaṃ, na saccā na dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:362: Na samudayo na samudayasaccaṃ, na saccā na nirodhasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:363: Na samudayo na samudayasaccaṃ, na saccā na maggasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:364: Na nirodho na nirodhasaccaṃ, na saccā na dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:365: Na nirodho na nirodhasaccaṃ, na saccā na samudayasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:366: Na nirodho na nirodhasaccaṃ, na saccā na maggasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:367: Na maggo na maggasaccaṃ, na saccā na dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:368: Na maggo na maggasaccaṃ, na saccā na samudayasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:369: Na maggo na maggasaccaṃ, na saccā na nirodhasaccaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:377: Na dukkhaṃ na saccaṃ, na saccā na dukkhaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:378: Na samudayo na saccaṃ, na saccā na samudayo.
tika-abh09t5:379: Na nirodho na saccaṃ, na saccā na nirodho.
tika-abh09t5:380: Na maggo na saccaṃ, na saccā na maggo.
tika-abh09t5:386: Samudayo saccaṃ, saccā dukkhaṃ…pe… saccā maggo.
tika-abh09t5:387: Nirodho saccaṃ, saccā dukkhaṃ…pe… saccā maggo.
tika-abh09t5:392: Na dukkhaṃ na saccaṃ, na saccā na samudayo.
tika-abh09t5:393: Na dukkhaṃ na saccaṃ, na saccā na nirodho.
tika-abh09t5:394: Na dukkhaṃ na saccaṃ, na saccā na maggo.
tika-abh09t5:395: Na samudayo na saccaṃ, na saccā na dukkhaṃ…pe… na saccā na maggo.
tika-abh09t5:396: Na nirodho na saccaṃ, na saccā na dukkhaṃ…pe… na saccā na maggo.
tika-abh09t5:397: Na maggo na saccaṃ, na saccā na dukkhaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:398: Na maggo na saccaṃ, na saccā na samudayo.
tika-abh09t5:399: Na maggo na saccaṃ, na saccā na nirodho.
tika-abh09t5:403: Tayosaṅkhārā (yama. 2.saṅkhārayamaka.1 ādayo) – kāyasaṅkhāro vacīsaṅkhāro cittasaṅkhāro. Assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro, vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhāro, saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro, ṭhapetvā vitakkavicāre sabbepi cittasampayuttakā dhammā cittasaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:410: Na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro, na kāyasaṅkhāro na kāyo.
tika-abh09t5:411: Na vacī na vacīsaṅkhāro, na vacīsaṅkhāro na vacī.
tika-abh09t5:412: Na cittaṃ na cittasaṅkhāro, na cittasaṅkhāro na cittaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:422: Na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na vacīsaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:423: Na kāyo na kāyasaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na cittasaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:424: Na vacī na vacīsaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na kāyasaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:425: Na vacī na vacīsaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na cittasaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:426: Na cittaṃ na cittasaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na kāyasaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:427: Na cittaṃ na cittasaṅkhāro, na saṅkhārā na vacīsaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:434: Na kāyasaṅkhāro na vacīsaṅkhāro, na vacīsaṅkhāro na kāyasaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:435: Na kāyasaṅkhāro na cittasaṅkhāro, na cittasaṅkhāro na kāyasaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:436: Na vacīsaṅkhāro na cittasaṅkhāro, na cittasaṅkhāro na vacīsaṅkhāro.
tika-abh09t5:439: Sattānusayā (yama. 2.anusayayamaka.1) – kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo.
tika-abh09t5:445: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati (yama. 2.cittayamaka.1 ādayo), tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:446: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:448: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:449: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:451: Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:452: Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:454: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:455: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:456: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:457: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:458: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha, tassa cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:459: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:461: Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhittha, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:462: Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:463: Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:464: Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:465: Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhittha, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhittha.
tika-abh09t5:466: Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhittha.
tika-abh09t5:468: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhittha, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:469: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:470: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:471: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:472: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:473: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:475: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:476: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhati, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:478: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:479: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:481: Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:482: Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:484: Yassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha, tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:485: Yassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha, tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:486: Yassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:487: Yassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati, tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:489: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:490: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:493: Na uppannaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:496: Na niruddhaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ na niruddhaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:498: Yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:499: Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittaṃ. Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:503: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:504: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:506: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:507: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:509: Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:510: Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:512: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:513: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:514: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:515: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:516: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:517: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:519: Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhittha, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:520: Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:521: Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:522: Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:523: Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha.
tika-abh09t5:524: Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha.
tika-abh09t5:526: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhittha, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:527: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:528: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:529: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:530: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:531: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:533: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:534: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:536: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:537: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:539: Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:540: Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:542: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha, taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:543: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha, taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:544: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:545: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati, taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:547: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:548: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:551: Na uppannaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:554: Na niruddhaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ na niruddhaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:556: Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:557: Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittaṃ. Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:561: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:562: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:564: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:565: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:567: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:568: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:570: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:571: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:572: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:573: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:574: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:575: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:577: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:578: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:579: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:580: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
tika-abh09t5:581: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha.
tika-abh09t5:582: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha.
tika-abh09t5:584: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:585: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:586: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:587: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:588: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:589: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:591: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:592: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:594: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:595: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:597: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:598: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:600: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:601: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:602: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:603: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:605: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:606: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati. Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
tika-abh09t5:609: Na uppannaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ na uppannaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:612: Na niruddhaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ na niruddhaṃ.
tika-abh09t5:614: Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa taṃ cittaṃ. Yassa avimuttaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh09t5:619: Yassa kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati…pe… yassa akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Yassa abyākataṃ cittaṃ uppajjati. Yassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
